backend/main.mo: Defines project, category, message, and featured item types with comparison and filtering utilities, plus maps for storing projects, messages, featured items, and user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature investigation tasks, related files, components, tests, and confidence for UI click-handling and pointer-events fixes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files such as sections, visuals, hooks, and utilities for build reference.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, theme variables, and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component assembling all sections, global background, theming, and a loading fallback.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Portfo: Modal displaying project details with escape-to-close handling and category formatting.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section with a glass panel, avatar, orbiting chips, and descriptive bio text.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: A contact form section with validation, submission via mutation, and social/WhatsApp links.
frontend/src/components/sections/Feature: Displays a carousel of featured project items sourced from backend or placeholders.
frontend/src/components/sections/FooterS: A footer showing the current year and a credit link with a decorative scan-line effect.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with mouse‑reactive animated backgrounds and buttons to scroll to portfolio or contact.
frontend/src/components/sections/Portfol: Portfolio grid with category filters, project loading, and a modal for viewing project details.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Shows a grid of service cards using TiltCard and GlassPanel with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/SkillsS: Animated skill bars that reveal progress when in view, respecting reduced motion settings.
frontend/src/components/visual/GlassPane: Reusable glassmorphism panel component with configurable neon color styles.
frontend/src/components/visual/GlobalBac: Renders global animated starfield and layered background images with reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/visual/OrbitingC: Displays animated skill chips orbiting in a circle, disabling animation when reduced motion is preferred.
Creates a card that tilts based on mouse position, with motion disabled for reduced-motion users.
Provides hardcoded placeholder projects and featured items for display before backend data exists.
frontend/src/content/siteConfig.ts: Stores site-wide config including name and social media links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, reloading dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth provider and hook handling login, stored identity, and related state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInViewOnce.ts: Offers a hook that tracks when an element first enters the viewport using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines data-fetching hooks using react-query for projects, categories, featured items, and contact submission.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind styles, custom animations, color variables, and global UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/reducedMotion.ts: Provides hooks to detect reduced-motion preference and adjust animation durations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL or hash parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, shadows, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the site's concept, architecture, issues, and feature requirements for a futuristic portfolio build.
